name: Qualite Manpower
description: In 2016, the founder members experienced gaps in recruitment processes. Businesses needed to consolidate their existing executive search processes as one was struggling to keep up with ever changing world of human resources. Most businesses were getting to a point when they realised they could no longer manage the search function processes with them. Simply put, they need an extended arm. Qualite Manpower was thus born with the purpose of filling the need gap through addition of talent management and HR audits to the search deliveries.
features: DEVELOP AN UNDERSTANDING OF THE ORGANIZATION
Headline: Shaping Careers, Growing Organizations.
ShortDescription: A recruitment services firm since 2017 specialising in IT , Consulting , Media & Entertainment and Manufacturing sector .The firm formed by professionals from IIM, and ISB. Qualite Manpower is synonymous to a cost-effective and time-saving approach towards finding just the right candidate for the right job – permanent or contractual.
enhanced_description: Qualite Manpower, established in 2016, emerged to address significant gaps in recruitment processes and the challenges businesses faced in managing their executive search functions. Recognizing the need for an 'extended arm' in human resources, the firm expanded its offerings to include talent management and HR audits alongside its search deliveries. Since 2017, this recruitment services firm has specialized in the IT, Consulting, Media & Entertainment, and Manufacturing sectors. Founded by professionals from IIM and ISB, Qualite Manpower is recognized for its cost-effective and time-saving approach to finding the right candidates for both permanent and contractual roles, aiming to shape careers and foster organizational growth.
competitive_advantages: Acts as an 'extended arm' for businesses struggling with internal search functions
Fills specific talent and HR process 'need gaps'
Ability to find the 'right candidate for the right job'
Flexibility in handling permanent and contractual roles
Founders are professionals from IIM and ISB (implying strong expertise and credibility)
implementation_scenarios: Consultative engagement model based on developing an understanding of the client's organization
Partnership approach for talent acquisition and HR support
roi_benefits: Improved employee happiness and engagement (as a business objective)
